duties_responsibilities.duty: Administer and maintain the company training database system, ensuring accurate creation and maintenance of courses and workgroups.
Research, plan, organize, and conduct training programs for company personnel, developing new training material and modifying existing programs as needed.
Prepare and distribute training aids, set up audiovisual equipment, and make presentations as needed.
Serve as a resource to investigate training issues and work with Floor Trainers to assist with Production Associate training.
Carry out cross-site training activities at multiple manufacturing facilities.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Training and Development, Business, or a related field (Master's preferred)
